Title: The Team Is Threatening to Leave! What Should I Do?
Description:
Today, we hear from:

•      A team member looking to purchase a business, but the team doesn’t want to stay

•      A business owner wanting to hire another chiropractor, but it would cut his salary in half

•      A street vendor making $1.5 million and wanting to increase his traffic level

•      A start-up business owner wondering if he should take on investors or go into debt to pay his team
